TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: Now we wait for the sound of the Yamato approaching...
I fire EMP. I win. Rockcoole, go play Mass Effecty now.

*collapses*

Roflcopter is still harpooned to rockcoole

I fire EMP. I win. Rockcoole, go play Mass Effecty now.

You are immobilised by a harpoon and net. We should wait for chobit to find this.
I will now go buy massy effect! Um.. could you come along as well. We seem to be stuck together...
Nop, I activated the Crucible. I win.

Nop, I activated the Crucible. I win.

Which mode? How much multiplayer did you do?
Great. Now goodbye I better play that game already.*leaves forum for severl hours to play game*
"Powering down. Rage097 killbot series-R is the property of chobit&trekkette Inc."

Which mode? How much multiplayer did you do?

No multiplayer, hard mode, with the extended cut DLC.

No multiplayer, hard mode, with the extended cut DLC.

Which firing mode? For spoilers, perhaps say colour or link with warning?
Oh you guys, I take a little time away to train for the day when I must face Chobit's face-melting rage in the skies over Europe, and I come back to see you've again begun to kill each other.

"Rage097 killbot series-R property of chobit&trekkete Inc. Has been reactivated!"

*rises slowly*

Oh you guys, I take a little time away to train for the day when I must face Chobit's face-melting rage in the skies over Europe, and I come back to see you've again begun to kill each other.

You cannot prepare for the rage of chobit. Would be nice to face her in combat in war thunder, if you don't mind dying repeatedly. Or face her with all the other players with you.

I thought you have learnt this is what we do by now?

Oh you guys, I take a little time away to train for the day when I must face Chobit's face-melting rage in the skies over Europe, and I come back to see you've again begun to kill each other.

Well, what did you expect? It always happens.

Which firing mode? For spoilers, perhaps say colour or link with warning?

Blue, because Red had its obvious problems and Green had the chance of the Old Machines rebelling.
And Blue doesn't?
*sneaks up behind roflcopter with rebar. Raised*
Blue has Shepard under control. Shepard will be the guardian of all races, and he has reason and direction to make him do so. Have you seen the extended cut version of it?

I'm not even gonna threaten people for the Star Trek sucks comment. Y'all seem to have... handled... the problem quite well.

Mass Effect looks all kinds of awesome, though. I plan to play it. One day. Also Skyrim.

You cannot prepare for the rage of chobit. Would be nice to face her in combat in war thunder, if you don't mind dying repeatedly. Or face her with all the other players with you.

I thought you have learnt this is what we do by now?

Chobit is the rage.

Blue has Shepard under control. Shepard will be the guardian of all races, and he has reason and direction to make him do so. Have you seen the extended cut version of it?

Yes I have, of all endings on maximum. And Shepard can be paragon or renegade. Would you want renegade guarding you?

So your not going to kill us trekkette? Now we just need assurance from chobit.
Ah, so chobit alone was controling me.
Nah. Chobit kinda shares the general consensus that Star Trek is not the be all and end all of scifi. Sometimes, I don't even know why I talk to her....

Nah. Chobit kinda shares the general consensus that Star Trek is not the be all and end all of scifi. Sometimes, I don't even know why I talk to her....

To convince her otherwise?
